Sentencas: This study investigates one of the most fundamental issues of integrating fuel cell (FC) generation into power systems - its effect on power system small-signal stability when it operates jointly with conventional power generation.
Titulo: Effect of grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell power generation on power systems small-signal stability

Sentencas: The study first presents a comprehensive mathematical model of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power plant integrated with the single-machine infinite-bus power system.
Titulo: Effect of grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell power generation on power systems small-signal stability

Sentencas: Based on the model, conventional damping torque analysis is carried out to study the effect of SOFC power generation on power system small-signal stability.
Titulo: Effect of grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell power generation on power systems small-signal stability

Sentencas: The analysis concludes that system small-signal stability can be affected either positively or negatively by the SOFC power plant when system operating conditions change.
Titulo: Effect of grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell power generation on power systems small-signal stability

Sentencas: Two examples of power systems with gird-connected SOFC power plants are presented.
Titulo: Effect of grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell power generation on power systems small-signal stability

Sentencas: Small-signal stability of the first example of single-machine power system was examined when the power system operated at different load conditions and levels of mixtures of conventional and FC power generation.
Titulo: Effect of grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell power generation on power systems small-signal stability

Sentencas: The second example is a four-machine two-area power system where the power supplied by the gird-connected SOFC power plant is variable.
Titulo: Effect of grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell power generation on power systems small-signal stability

Sentencas: Results of simulation using full non-linear model of the power systems and the SOFC power plants are given.
Titulo: Effect of grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell power generation on power systems small-signal stability

Sentencas: All the results from the example power systems confirm and further demonstrate the analysis presented and conclusions obtained.
Titulo: Effect of grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell power generation on power systems small-signal stability
